rooms.Name: A Small Opening Into the Earth
rooms.Description:
You stand outside a large cave opening. A head depicting some kind of 
horned beast is carved into the rock above the gaping entrance.
Coming from within the darkness before you, the cries of tormented
souls sends shivers down your spine.

rooms.Name: In a Musty Tunnel
rooms.Description:
You start to feel claustrophobic as you franticly look around this earthy
tunnel. Looking behind you, a few beams of sunlight streak onto the tunnel's
walls and floor. You wonder if you should turn back now or brave the
uncertain dangers which lie within.

Exits.Description:
A rusty iron portcullis blocks the passage ahead. With a little effort
it may be possible to move it...

rooms.Name: A Musty Tunnel
rooms.Description:
The earthen tunnel ahead is sealed off by a rotted wooden door, bound with
iron straps. On the tunnel's floor are footprints of what you believe to be
another humanoid, but they are quite small, possibly of a hobbit or elf.
The footprints seem to go in one direction past the door. You stop again
to ponder your fate.

Exits.Description: A rotted wooden door, bound with iron straps, hangs on ancient hinges.
A rusty iron portcullis.

rooms.Name: A Slope in the Musty Tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tunnel ahead slopes sharply downwards. As you continue down the passage,
the composition of the walls becomes more jagged. Sharp rocks stick out of
the walls and small fragments of granite are scattered among the soil.

Exits.Description: A wooden door with iron bands lies to the south.

rooms.Name: A Musty Tunnel
rooms.Description:
As the tunnel ceases its decline, the odor of stagnant water and mold
wrinkles your nose. The walls here are nearly completely composed of
stone.

rooms.Name: A Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
The musty odor of the room is quite strong here. The stone beneath you is
scattered with patches of a black fungus, and as a result is slightly
slippery.

rooms.Name: Center of a Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
The floor here is nearly -impossible- to walk on! Small pools of
the horrid-smelling, stagnant water are splashed all over the floor
here, which makes the floor very very slippery. A large pool of
dark water is in the center of the room, stinking to such an extent
that you are forced to plug your nose.

rooms.Name: A Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
The black fungus which is everywhere in this room, makes the floor
difficult to traverse. Taking small steps, you manage to move carefully
around to explore.

rooms.Name: A Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
There are a number of small puddles of what you think was once water
on the floor here. To the south the moldy floor seems to thrive with
vigor. A granite hallway is to the north and the moldy room continues
to the west.

rooms.Name: A Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this section of the room, you notice a stone alcove to the
north. You wonder if the mold growing there is as disgusting as it is
here and elsewhere in this room.

rooms.Name: A Stony Alcove
rooms.Description:
You stand in a stone alcove, connecting the rank room to the south with
an oddly silent room to the north. Your lantern sends shadows flickering
on the walls, and to the north you sense danger.

rooms.Name: A Room Strewn with Snakeskins
rooms.Description:
The sound of grating stone and metal on metal startles you as a heavy
stone block seals off the entrance to this room. On the floor ahead are
dozens of molted snakeskins, whose owners dont appear to be far away.
Although you appear to be trapped, the southeast wall seems oddly
constructed. You begin to wonder if there could be a secret there.

Exits.Description: You see something strange... there may be a secret hidden here.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
The walls of this long hallway have been scared over time. Large pieces
of granite have fallen from the ceiling in various places, making you
feel slightly uneasy. The passageway continues east and to the south
opens into a moldy room.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
The crumbling stone hallway continues to the west, and to the east
opens into a large room.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder Holes
rooms.Description:
As you look above you, you notice the large number of spear-sized
holes which cover the ceiling. You hope they won't be used for some
time to come.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder Holes
rooms.Description:
You stop suddenly as you watch bits of dirt fall through one of the
holes in the ceiling. As you stand frozen in the room, you think you
hear some mutters coming from above. Hopefully it is just your 
imagination.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder Holes
rooms.Description:
You feel as paranoid as ever walking in this room. Pieces of broken spears
are scattered about the room. You shiver as you feel a watchful eye from
above search you over.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder Holes
rooms.Description:
You are almost positive you hear something moving above you. Quiet grunts
and the sound of footsteps echo through the murder holes above you. You
notice a large door on the eastern wall.

Exits.Description: A LARGE metal door with rivits lies to the east.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder holes
rooms.Description:
In the corner of this section of the room lies the remains of a former
adventurer. Through his head has been thrust a wooden spear, ending
his life instantly.

rooms.Name: A Stone Room with Murder Holes
rooms.Description:
Staring at the ceiling you wonder when you will be implaed by spears.
There is definately something up there moving about, hopefully it won't
find you here.

rooms.Name: A Storage Room
rooms.Description:
In this room lie various instruments for making wine. Spare barrels,
empty flasks, mallets and other broken junk clutter the floor and
shelves on the walls. There seems to be nothing of interest here.

Exits.Description: A crooked door leans on rusty hinges to the south.

rooms.Name: A Cramped and Littered Passage
rooms.Description:
Splinters of wood, about the size of a human arm, are scattered about
the hallway here. The passageway is quite narrow here and to the
east, but to the west it opens into a room.

Exits.Description: A LARGE metal door with small rivits lies to the west.

rooms.Name: A Cramped and Littered Passage
rooms.Description:
The cramped passageway continues to the west, and to the east is
a metal door. The door seems to be an entrance to a secure room.

Exits.Description: A metal door with the word 'JAIL' engraved upon it lies to the east.

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...

Exits.Description: A metal door seals off the exit to the west.

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...

Exits.Description: Some half-broken and rusty iron bars guard a small holding cell to the east.

rooms.Name: An Empty Cell
rooms.Description:
This cramped cell looks as it may have hosted human life in the past. Small
markes carved into the walls and floor seem to have counted the days of
imprisonment. However, the groups of markings seem to be few, as the poor
souls days' here were short.

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...

Exits.Description: Some half-broken and rusty iron bars guard a small holding cell to the east.

rooms.Name: An Empty Cell
rooms.Description:
This cramped cell looks as it may have hosted human life in the past. Small
markes carved into the walls and floor seem to have counted the days of
imprisonment. However, the groups of markings seem to be few, as the poor
souls days' here were short.

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...
A dark mahogany door lies to the west.

Exits.Description: A dark mahogany door, marred with dents and scratches, lies to the west.

rooms.Name: An Old Prison
rooms.Description:
The stench of urine and dead animals lingers in this room. As you peer about
this room, you see several different torture devices, whips and human bones
lying amongst the waste. You get the feeling that you may not be alone here...

Exits.Description: Some half-broken and rusty iron bars guard a small holding cell to the east.

rooms.Name: An Empty Cell
rooms.Description:
This cramped cell looks as it may have hosted human life in the past. Small
markes carved into the walls and floor seem to have counted the days of
imprisonment. However, the groups of markings seem to be few, as the poor
souls days' here were short.

rooms.Name: The Jailer's Chambers
rooms.Description:
The room here is slightly cleaner, unlike the room to the east. The floor
is not completely devoid of bones and feces, but in places it is almost
traverseable.

Exits.Description: A dark mahogany door, marred with dents and scratches, lies to the east.

rooms.Name: The Jailer's Chambers
rooms.Description:
In the corner of the room a small metal chest rests on the cold stone
floor. Whoever lives here seems to know the meaning of security as the
chest appears to be closed and locked. An evil grin creeps across your
face as you glance about you casually, only to see no owner in sight.

rooms.Name: The Jailer's Chambers
rooms.Description:
The first thing you notice in the corner of this filthy room is the
disgusting bed which seems to be the source of the horrible body-odor
smell here. Small scraps of old meat are on the floor here which are
evidence enough that someone has been here recently.

rooms.Name: The Jailer's Chambers
rooms.Description:
You suddenly stop as you think you hear movement in the room. Listening
silently, you swear you hear deep breathing to the west. To the north
the wall is covered with a black fungus, and beneath it a door is barely
visible.

Exits.Description: You see a wooden door, covered with a black mold.

rooms.Name: A Passage Covered with Mildew
rooms.Description:
Your hand brushes a furry part of the wall as you enter this passage. In utter
disgust you look around. Dark strands of mold hang from all walls here, making
it seem as though fur from some animal has been hung around in decoration.

Exits.Description: A -very- moldy door, half rotted away and stinking to high heaven, lies east.
A wooden door, totally ridden with black mildew, rots to the south.

rooms.Name: A Passage Covered with Mildew
rooms.Description:
The furry walls of this passageway seem to converge to a dead end. As you
walk closer towards the end of this hallway, you notice several patches
of a yellow-green slime hanging from the ceiling. You cautiously investigate
it as your curiousty gets the best of you.

rooms.Name: A Room with Flickering Torches
rooms.Description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates throughout the chamber before you.
Torchlight dances across the cuniform writings which have been scrawled on
various walls. This chamber appears to be fairly empty to first glance,
but you have the odd sensation that there is some kind of life nearby...

Exits.Description: A wooden door, covered with a black mold, lies to the west.

rooms.Name: A Room with Flickering Torches
rooms.Description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates throughout the chamber before you.
Torchlight dances across the cuniform writings which have been scrawled on
various walls. This chamber appears to be fairly empty to first glance,
but you have the odd sensation that there is some kind of life nearby...

rooms.Name: A Room with Flickering Torches
rooms.Description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates throughout the chamber before you.
Torchlight dances across the cuniform writings which have been scrawled on
various walls. On the west wall you notice some odd writing. To the north
a torchlit passageway slopes downwards while far off to the east you see
a maroon curtain on the wall.

Exits.Description: You see something strange...

rooms.Name: A Room with Flickering Torches
rooms.Description:
The echo of your footsteps reverberates throughout the chamber before you.
Torchlight dances across the cuniform writings which have been scrawled on
various walls. This chamber appears to be fairly empty to first glance,
but you have the odd sensation that there is some kind of life nearby...
To the east, a dirty maroon curtain moves slightly. You wonder if it could
have something to do with the bloodstains which taint it.

Exits.Description: A blood-stained, maroon curtain covers the east wall.

rooms.Name: A Very Cramped Dirt Room
rooms.Description:
You peer into the darkness of this small, recluse room and realize you might
have made a mistake in doing so. This small chamber appears to be the home
of some type of magical creature, a strong force pushes you back into the
room from which you entered...

Exits.Description: The secret door from which you entered lies to the east.

rooms.Name: A Cold Passage
rooms.Description:
The cool hallway in which you stand continues to the east, and to the west
opens into a dimly torchlit chamber. A chilling breeze sweeps through this
hallway for a moment, as though someone had opened a door.

Exits.Description: A blood-stained, maroon curtain moves silently in the shadows.

rooms.Name: Turn in a Cold Passage
rooms.Description:
The cold passageway extends further to the west, while to the south it seems
to open into another small chamber - possibly a storeroom or another bed 
chamber.

rooms.Name: A Cold Room with Granite Walls
rooms.Description:
This room seems to be some sort of lair. At one time it appears to have been
a bed chamber, but from the smell of things, you are certain some beast
or beasts have taken a liking to it and christened it their home.

rooms.Name: A Cold Room with Granite Walls
rooms.Description:
A small depression in the corner of this room seems to be a resting place
for whatever animals dwell here. Small bits of grey fur have collected in
this corner, as well as the remains of several different animals which
looks as though may have served their purpose as being quite nutritional.

rooms.Name: A Cold Room with Granite Walls
rooms.Description:
The smell of some kind of animal is very inconspicuous in this corner. You
are -sure- there is something nearby. As you become more nervous, your
curiosity seems to quickly retreat. Certainly anything with an odor this
repugnant wouldn't be friendly.

rooms.Name: A Cold Room with Granite Walls
rooms.Description:
Large paw tracks are easily visable on the floor here. You see more patches
of dark fur and a few humanoid teeth on the floor and wonder where these
creatures could be.

rooms.Name: A Passage Sloping Downwards
rooms.Description:
This short passage adjacent to the torchlit room to the south, sharply
slopes downwards over the next few feet. The sound of your footsteps seem
to quietly vanish into the dark; absorbed by the quiet waters below.

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
The darkness over these waters is frighteningly thick. Silence enshrouds
this pitch-black sanctuary and although you still feel the heart in your
chest beat its steady rhythm, you feel as though you've joined the dead.

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
The dark waters continue to the east and north. You feel your jugular for
a pulse again; you feel so empty here.

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
The pitch-blackness over these waters is amazing.. you are certainly glad
you brought your lightsource, else you're certain you would lose your way.

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
The intense silence here makes you want to scream! To the south and east
the dark waters continue, however, to the northeast there seems to be
a yellowish lightsource. You wonder what it could be...

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
The darkness continues to the east and north. You feel your jugular for
a pulse again; you feel so empty here. An eerie yellow glow can be
seen closeby to the north.

rooms.Name: A Subterrainean Lake
rooms.Description:
Off to the northwest, an eerie yellow glow breaks the monotony of the
cloak of blindness about you. To the west and south - blackness.

rooms.Name: Before the Stone Doors
rooms.Description:
Towering before you stand two, large double doors. Several runes of
an unknown orgin are chisled onto them, many of which are now damaged
from age. Looking very thick and secure, you are sure whatever lies
within, is meant to stay there.

Exits.Description: Two stone double-doors, engraved with ancient runes, lie to the north.

rooms.Name: A Muddy Hallway
rooms.Description:
Flickering torches illuminate this passage, sending their rays of light
bouncing about the earthen walls. A cool drop of water occasionally falls
on your head from the ceiling, alerting you to the fact that there must
be somewhere where this water collects. The passage slopes off to the
north, and set of strong double doors guard the way to the south.

Exits.Description: Two stone double doors guard the southern walls.

rooms.Name: A Muddy Hallway
rooms.Description:
Flickering torches illuminate this passage, sending their rays of light
bouncing about the earthen walls. A cool drop of water occasionally falls
on your head from the ceiling, alerting you to the fact that there must
be somewhere where this water collects. The passage continues to the
north and south.

rooms.Name: A Muddy Hallway
rooms.Description:
Flickering torches illuminate this passage, sending their rays of light
bouncing about the earthen walls. A cool drop of water occasionally falls
on your head from the ceiling, alerting you to the fact that there must
be somewhere where this water collects. The north way is blocked by
some huge, copper doors. You sigh, wondering what could be behind them.

Exits.Description: Some muddy copper doors guard the north way.

rooms.Name: Lair of the FyreWyrm
rooms.Description:
This room is unbearably hot! You now know why this beast must need to
thrive near so much water. Surely enough, however, water is not the only
thing this creature has a thirst for...

rooms.Name: A Hazy Cavern
rooms.Description:
The cool, moist air covers your face with small beads of water. As you
reach up to wipe the moisture from your brow, you are suddenly startled
by a loud *clang* which echos through the cavern. You are not alone here,
that is for certain.

rooms.Name: A Hazy Cavern
rooms.Description:
In the distance you hear a low roar from what you imagine to be a massive
waterfall. Neon red eyes occasionally blink from within the thick mists,
peering at you, the intruder in their lair.

Exits.Description: Some muddy copper doors seal the south exit.

rooms.Name: The Rocky Bottom of the Chasm
rooms.Description:
Crashing onto solid stone, sevral bones in your body shatter instantly
into thousands of splinters. A shooting pain seers throughout your
entire body, and from the size of what is staring at you, you have a
feeling that the worst has yet to come...
... You have an incredible urge to leave now.

rooms.Name: On the Edge of a Deep Chasm
rooms.Description:
WOAH!  Your heart races as you nearly fall off the edge of a GIGANTIC
cliff, off of which roars a hefty amount of water. As you teeter on the
edge of what could be the speedy end to your pathetic life, you stare
down into the swirling waters below and wonder if your life is really
worth all that much anyhow...

rooms.Name: A Hazy Cavern
rooms.Description:
The roar of the water grows louder and louder as you approach a small
ledge which circles around the center of this vast chasm. Wiping your eyes
every few seconds to keep your vision straight, your wonder weather or not
this slippery rock is the best place to be standing...

rooms.Name: Deeper into the Chasm
rooms.Description:
Gravity seems to vanish as your fingers slip from the wet stone above!
Freezing water numbs your skin and chills your soul as the dark waters
below spin swiftly towards your fragile body. You are soon engulfed
in the full stream of pounding falls and go drifting into a dark place
below...

Exits.Description: You see nothing special about the rock above.
You notice a small engraving of a pentagram.

rooms.Name: Plummeting Into a Deep Chasm
rooms.Description:
AAAAGH! You scream madly as you find yourself being swallowed into
the deep chasm below. Your skeleton is jarred as your body is twisted,
bounding and rebounding off of jagged rocks. Your head nearly splits as
you crash into a small, rock platform. You quickly grasp a crevice in the
rock, and dangle for a moment, confused by the overwhelming pain which
surges through your body. You are uncertain how much longer you will
survive...

Exits.Description:
The veins of silver which run through this rock would be quite
valueable if extracted. You notice a small hole in one of the veins...

rooms.Name: The Edge Around a Deep Chasm
rooms.Description:
Walking slowly as not to slip and fall to your certain death, you approach
an ancient and undoubtedly slippery bridge. The sight of the enormous
waterfall to the east is spectacular, and you find yourself staring down
into the chasm below for an uncanny amount of time. You swear you see
something red moving below in the water, but nothing could survive there...
     ... or so you think

rooms.Name: Bridge Over the Chasm
rooms.Description:
Extending 30 feet over a large gap in the ledge, you stand on a soggy
and yes, slippery, wooden plank bridge. You freeze as you hear a roar
from below and remain silent... motionless... crouching hundreds of
feet above dark, churning waters. 'It must be the water', you think to
yourself reassuringly. Yet an uncontrolable urge dangerously beckons
you from below...

rooms.Name: A Hazy Cavern
rooms.Description:
Standing on solid rock once again, your heartbeat returns to near-normal
as you feel much safer not being on a certain bridge. However, still
feeling rather unwelcome here, you keep your jaw locked, ready for battle.

rooms.Name: A Hazy Cavern
rooms.Description:
The cavern comes abruptly to an end to the east, and to the south tapers
off into the chasm below. A deep snarl comes drifting out of the mists
below, warning you to leave now or perish!

rooms.Name: An Obscure Gutted Tunnel
rooms.Description:
Water drips on your head from the stalagtites above as you squeeze
yourself through the small, muddy opening into this dank, earthy
tunnel. Your feet sink into the moist soil beneath your feet and your
imagination begins to draw frightening scenarios.

rooms.Name: End of the Obscure Tunnel
rooms.Description:
The passage twists briefly to the northeast, where it is stopped by a
large mass of collapsed, wet earth. Bones jut out of the earth here and
you wonder if this could have once been an entryway to catacombs or
perhaps something worse...

rooms.Name: Northwest Corner of a Small Moldy Room
rooms.Description:
As you near the corner of this room, the mold on the floor is less
abundant. To the west lies a granite passageway, and to the east the
mold thrives and prospers.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
The walls of this long hallway have been scared over time. Large pieces
of granite have fallen from the ceiling in various places, making you
feel slightly uneasy. The passageway continues to the west and to the
east opens into a damp room.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description: The dark stone hallway bends here, and continues to the north and east.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
A half dozen, small rats skitter northwards into a room as you approach
them. To the south the passage continues and to the north it seems to
open into a stone room.

rooms.Name: The Underground Distillery
rooms.Description:
This room smells strongly of old wine. To the east and west you notice some
large wooden objects. A small trail of what you believe to be wine leads
to the west and to the north.

rooms.Name: The Underground Distillery
rooms.Description:
It is obvious, from the size of the wooden cask leaking a sweet-smelling,
liquid, that this is indeed an underground distillery. You wonder if
anyone would mind if you just took a sip or two.

rooms.Name: The Underground Distillery
rooms.Description:
The first thing that catches your eye as you near the corner of this
section of the distillery is that there is no cask! Someone seems to
have made off with it. You quickly assume that whatever took the cask
must have drank most all of it as the smell of vomit wafts down the stairs
in the northwest corner of this room.

rooms.Name: The Underground Distillery
rooms.Description:
It is obvious, from the size of the wooden cask leaking a sweet-smelling,
liquid, that this is indeed an underground distillery. You wonder if
anyone would mind if you just took a sip or two.

rooms.Name: The Underground Distillery
rooms.Description:
It is obvious, from the size of the wooden cask leaking a sweet-smelling,
liquid, that this is indeed an underground distillery. You wonder if
anyone would mind if you just took a sip or two.

Exits.Description: An old, crooked door lies to the north.

rooms.Name: Atop Some Stone Steps
rooms.Description:
Standing atop the stairs which lead down into a distillery, you peer north
into the dark tunnel and see... darkness... Somehow you expected that.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
The walls of this long hallway have been scared over time. Large pieces
of granite have fallen from the ceiling in various places, making you
feel slightly uneasy. The passageway continues to the north and south.
It seems that a large section of the floor here has crumbled away, revealing
an earthen tunnel below.

rooms.Name: A Collapsed Passageway
rooms.Description:
The dusty air in this passageway makes you cough. Rubble from the ceiling
which has collapsed long ago lays around in a disorderly fasion, clogging
the tunnel to the northwest somewhat. The only exits here are up and
to the northwest.

rooms.Name: Bend in a Collapsed Passageway
rooms.Description:
Several large support beams have given under the stress of the heavy
granite ceiling. The cramped passage is littered with rubble and does
not seem like a safe place to stay for very long.

rooms.Name: A Crumbling Room
rooms.Description:
The passage to the south opens into this small, fragile chamber. The
walls of this room are composed entirely of a slatelike rock which
looks very unstable. In the center of the room stands a noble statue
which smiles at you upon your entrance.

rooms.Name: A Hallway Carved Through Granite
rooms.Description:
The walls of this long hallway have been scared over time. Large pieces
of granite have fallen from the ceiling in various places, making you
feel slightly uneasy. The passage continues further to the north and south.

rooms.Name: End of the Granite hallway
rooms.Description:
The stone hallway has come to an end here. A statue of a jinni, his arms
crossed solmnly, is posed agains the northern wall. To the east lies a
closed, wooden door. Oddly, you feel a slight draft coming from the north.

Exits.Description: A statue of a jinni rests here against the wall. It looks quite heavy.

rooms.Name: The Room with Broken Furniture
rooms.Description:
It seems as though you have entered an unpromising room. Trash and glass
has been left about for another to clean up, but another never did his
job. On the north wall lies an intricate mural painting, depicting a large
wormlike creature. To the south lies the entrance from which you just came.

Exits.Description:
A large mural covers the north wall. It depicts the slaying of a giant
wormlike creature.
The statue to the south looks like it may move with a little effort...

rooms.Name: A Room Cluttered with Bones
rooms.Description:
The smell of urine and feces overpowers your sense of smell, nearly making
you lose balance! Small patches of hair are scattered about the floor,
and from the corner of the room you hear an occasional, doglike "yip!".

rooms.Name: A Room Cluttered with Bones
rooms.Description:
Small, gnawed bones from various animals lay about the rubbish and animal
waste in this section of the room. You wonder how any living animal could
survive in here with the rancid, stomach-twisting stench.

rooms.Name: A Room Cluttered with Bones
rooms.Description:
The only thought that passes through your mind at this point is how
quickly you can leave this vile place. After giving a coule of un-
fruitful heaves, your stomach finally settles down. You have no idea
how long it will be before you cannot take the foul odor any longer...

rooms.Name: A Room Cluttered with Bones
rooms.Description:
You curse to yourself as you step somewhere you would have prefered not
to. 'Those damn creatures will pay for this', you swear to yourself as
you carefully watch where your next step places your foot.

rooms.Name: The Room with Broken Furniture
rooms.Description:
Wooden splinters poke at the soles of your boots, trying desperately
to wedge themselves into your poor feet. Glass from broken plates and
vials is against the north wall. Someone has certainly made a mess...

rooms.Name: The Room with Broken Furniture
rooms.Description:
Shattered furnature is strewn about the room, among other waste, some
of which you care not to even look at. To the south lies a soft-looking
crimson curtain.

rooms.Name: Closet in the Room with Broken Furnaure
rooms.Description:
You find yourself in a small, cluttered closet. Quickly glancing over
the room, you see nothing of interest here with the exception of a
small, unpromising, rotten chest.

rooms.Name: A Room Cluttered with Bones
rooms.Description:
Skulls and femurs of human and goblin alike are evidence enough that the
animals which inhabit this area are not too choosy about their dinner.
Perhaps you better flee while you can...
